description: A shell script used to test the availability of a TCP host and port, with options for timeout, quiet mode, strict mode, and executing commands after the test.

methods.name: echoerr
methods.description: Outputs error messages to stderr if not in quiet mode.

methods.name: wait_for
methods.description: Waits for a specified host and port to become available, with timeout handling.

methods.name: wait_for_wrapper
methods.description: Wraps wait_for with support for SIGINT and timeout.

search-terms: bash TCP host port test script
